column1: Baby Barnaby's////I'm not even a breakfast person
column2: but the combination of ingredients in those scrambled eggs is genius and well executed
column3: full of flavor and good texture. I normally hate typical breakfast sausage
column4: but their chicken apple sausage is sweet and thus delish! The potatoes are shaped like small rectangular prisms
column5: but they taste sort of like seasoned waffle fries... does that make sense? Wheat toast is wheat toast
column6: but you get a whole assortment of packaged jams to spread
